articles.author: Joanna Plucinska, Tsvetelia Tsolova
articles.title: Despite hi-tech advances, many Europeans wary of taking COVID shot - Reuters India
articles.description: Europe rolled out a huge COVID-19 vaccination drive on Sunday to try to rein in the coronavirus pandemic but many Europeans are sceptical about the speed at which the vaccines have been tested and approved and reluctant to have the shot.
articles.content: WARSAW/SOFIA (Reuters) - Europe rolled out a huge COVID-19 vaccination drive on Sunday to try to rein in the coronavirus pandemic but many Europeans are sceptical about the speed at which the vaccine… [+4694 chars]

articles.title: Europe launches unprecedented vaccination campaign - Reuters
